con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="SdkService" targetNamespace="http://sdk.ws.licentio.smarttrust.com/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://sdk.ws.licentio.smarttrust.com/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://sdk.ws.licentio.smarttrust.com/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="authenticate" nillable="true" type="tns:authenticate"/> <xs:element name="authenticateResp" nillable="true" type="tns:authenticateResp"/> <xs:element name="changeLanguage" nillable="true" type="tns:changeLanguage"/> <xs:element name="changeLanguageResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:changeLanguageResponse"/> <xs:element name="resetPIN" nillable="true" type="tns:resetPIN"/> <xs:element name="resetPINResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:resetPINResponse"/> <xs:element name="retrieveOtp" nillable="true" type="tns:retrieveOtp"/> <xs:element name="retrieveOtpResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:retrieveOtpResponse"/> <xs:element name="sendOtp" nillable="true" type="tns:sendOtp"/> <xs:element name="sendOtpResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:sendOtpResponse"/> <xs:element name="sendSM" nillable="true" type="tns:sendSM"/> <xs:element name="sendSMResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:sendSMResponse"/> <xs:element name="validateOtp" nillable="true" type="tns:validateOtp"/> <xs:element name="validateOtpResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:validateOtpResponse"/> <xs:element name="verify" nillable="true" type="tns:verify"/> <xs:element name="verifyResponse" nillable="true" type="tns:verifyResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="validateOtp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="msisdn" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="otp" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="validateOtpResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:sdkValidateOtpResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="sdkValidateOtpResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:SdkResultType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="retrieveOtp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="msisdn" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="length" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="lifetime" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="otpseed" nillable="true" type="xs:base64Binary"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="retrieveOtpResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:sdkOtpResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="sdkOtpResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:SdkResultType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="transactionId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="otp" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="sendSM"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="msisdn" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="text" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="validityPeriod" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="sendSMResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:sdkResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="sdkResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:SdkResultType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="transactionId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="changeLanguage"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="msisdn" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="langFile" type="xs:byte"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="changeLanguageResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:sdkResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="authenticate"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="request" type="tns:authenticateRequest"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="authenticateRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="subject" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="subjectType" type="tns:SubjectType"/> <xs:element name="protocol" type="tns:Protocol"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="authenticateResp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="response" type="tns:authenticateResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="authenticateResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="mobileAuthentication" type="tns:MobileAuthenticationType"/> <xs:element name="pollUrl" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="language" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:AuthenticateResultType"/> <xs:element name="transactionId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="sendOtp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="msisdn" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="length" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="lifetime" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="sendOtpResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:sdkOtpResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="resetPIN"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="msisdn" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="resetPINResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:sdkResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="verify"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="transactionId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="otp" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="verifyResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:AuthenticateResultType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="SdkResultType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OK"/> <xs:enumeration value="ERROR"/> <xs:enumeration value="MSISDN_NOT_EXIST"/> <xs:enumeration value="OTP_EXPIRED"/> <xs:enumeration value="INVALID_LENGTH"/> <xs:enumeration value="INVALID_VALIDITY_PERIOD"/> <xs:enumeration value="NOT_VALID_OTP"/> <xs:enumeration value="SEND_FAILURE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="SubjectType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="EMAIL"/> <xs:enumeration value="USERNAME"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Protocol"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SAML"/> <xs:enumeration value="OPENID"/> <xs:enumeration value="RADIUS"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="MobileAuthenticationType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OTP"/> <xs:enumeration value="SIM"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="AuthenticateResultType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OK"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAILED"/> <xs:enumeration value="ONGOING"/> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNAL_ERROR"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="changeLanguage"> <wsdl:part element="tns:changeLanguage" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="resetPIN"> <wsdl:part element="tns:resetPIN" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message>
